recipe.title: Apio-Rey
instructions: 1. Puree the chopped celery, celery seeds, coriander seeds, and grapes in a blender with the still water. Strain through a fine-mesh sieve into a large pitcher. 2. Add the sparkling water, stir gently, and serve.
1. Puree the chopped celery, celery seeds, coriander seeds, and grapes in a blender with the still water. Strain through a fine-mesh sieve into a large pitcher.
2. Add the sparkling water, stir gently, and serve.
